item.description:
Hey everyone!! It's that time of year for the biggest and best boxer event we have.....the boxer bash!!! This is an event we put on Boxer Buddies Rescue and its just a great event. Its a $10.00 cover which includes your lunch and entrance. There will be vendors here and fun activities for the pups and people! Hope you can make it!!

Also if anyone know of any vendors who would be interested in setting up a table or offer a donation please let me know. Plus we are in need of tables, chairs, food and donations! If you would like to help just send me an e-mail. Krismass@aol.com

Thanks so much!

Kris
item.name: Boxer Bash
